description:
The Commander Type Battle Pod is used by commanding officers of the Mardook`s Zentradi Forces. The Commander Type Battle Pod larger than the standard model and has fewer weapons, but is most likely superior in performance to the regular http://anidb.net/ch49120 [Battle Pod].
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross2/battlepodcommand.htm
name: Zentradi Shikikan-you Sentou Pod
